title: Introduction to the ADK
description: A multilingual presentation about the Agent Development Kit

text.en: Today we'll learn how to build AI agents using the Agent Development Kit.
text.es: Hoy aprenderemos cómo construir agentes de IA usando el Agent Development Kit.

text.en: The ADK is a powerful SDK for building conversational AI agents.
text.es: El ADK es un SDK poderoso para construir agentes de IA conversacionales.

text.en: It provides a simple API for common tasks.
text.es: Proporciona una API simple para tareas comunes.
